title: Join us on LinkedIn | Engineering Alumni | University of Illinois at Chicago
contents: It all starts with a single spark          Skip to the content of this page ,  the main menu , the secondary menu , the site search form , the site home page .           Engineering Alumni     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Engineering Alumni      Engineering Alumni   Main Menu    News           Dean's List    RISE Magazine         Events           Upcoming Events         Get Involved           Join us on LinkedIn    Become a Mentor    Volunteer    Engineer your own involvement    Honor a Professor         Awards           2019 Alumni Award Honorees    2018 Alumni Award Honorees    2017 Alumni Award Honorees         Give    Contact     Eyebrow menu    College of Engineering    Engineering Career Center    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Engineering Alumni    Get Involved    Join us on LinkedIn        Join us on LinkedIn  UIC Engineering maintains a presence on LinkedIn in two ways that might interest alumni.       LinkedIn alumni group   This is UIC Engineering’s official private alumni group on LinkedIn. Follow the link below and request to join the group. We screen requests to make sure that all members have attended the College, creating a true sense of community online.  The alumni group is a great place to post job opportunities, find former classmates, share news, learn about upcoming events that are open exclusively to alumni, and post about current issues in engineering or your particular industry.  Please join us!        LinkedIn public page   The college’s public page on LinkedIn is designed primarily for people who are new to UIC—for example, prospective students and faculty—but alumni may enjoy the news feed that is located on this page below the “About us” box.  Please “follow” this page (you should see a blue button in the left-hand column) so that our updates show up in your LinkedIn news feed. Alternatively, bookmark it and visit whenever you like. This also is a great page to suggest to your professional contacts who may be interested in serving as a partner to UIC Engineering.           Get Involved           Join us on LinkedIn    Become a Mentor    Volunteer    Engineer your own involvement    Honor a Professor
